title: N0018925RZ003 M1BC - ROTHR Operations and Maintenance Services

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All invoices, purchases orders, contracts, loan agreements, statements of work, procurement documents (but not limited to solicitation documents or notices of proposed contracts, proposed bids, unsolicited proposals, and/or documents justifying contracting without full and open competition) relating to the following specific procurement identifiers:

N0018925RZ003

This request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am the deputy editor for The Latino Newsletter, a new media outlet focused on Latinx issues in the United States, and any documents obtained from this request will be used in the course of reporting for TLN. (https://thelatinonewsletter.org/). Therefore, I request to be considered a media requestor and request a fee waiver.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
